lists.PrivacyPolicy:
Privacy Policy

Thank you for using Quote, developed by Nweb Developer. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting any information you share with us.

Information Collection and Use:
Quote does not collect any personal data from its users. We do not require access to your device's internet connection, nor do we collect, store, or share any user data.

Terms of Service:
By using Quote, you agree to abide by our terms of service. This app is designed for entertainment and informational purposes only. Nweb Developer holds no liability for any actions taken as a result of using this app.

Contact Us:
If you have any questions or concerns regarding our privacy policy or terms of service, please contact us at [insert contact email].

lists.name: Love_Calculator
lists.title: Love Calculator
lists.description: Curious about your romantic chemistry? Love Calculator has the answers! Simply enter your names and let our app generate a compatibility percentage along with a personalized remark. Whether you're crushing, dating, or deeply committed, discover your love potential with just a few taps. It's fun, it's easy, and it might just spark a flame. Download Love Calculator now and see where your heart leads you!
